SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, issue_type_id, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, issue_id, pre_conditions, issue_processor_xcd, sp_claim_type_xcd, sp_claim_value, denied_reason_xcd FROM elp_issue WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.LOAD_SEARCH_LIST: SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID AS ISSUE_ID, EI.CODE AS CODE, EI.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, EIT.DESCRIPTION AS ISSUE_TYPE, to_Char(EI.EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EI.EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM elp_issue EI INNER JOIN elp_issue_type EIT ON EI.ISSUE_TYPE_ID = EIT.ISSUE_TYPE_ID WHERE EI.ISSUE_TYPE_ID = :ISSUE_TYPE_ID --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY Code, Expiration
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID AS ISSUE_ID, EI.CODE AS CODE, EI.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, EIT.DESCRIPTION AS ISSUE_TYPE, to_Char(EI.EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EI.EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM elp_issue EI INNER JOIN elp_issue_type EIT ON EI.ISSUE_TYPE_ID = EIT.ISSUE_TYPE_ID WHERE rownum < 101 --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY Code, Expiration
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_LIST: SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID AS ISSUE_ID, EI.CODE AS CODE, EI.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, EIT.DESCRIPTION AS ISSUE_TYPE, to_Char(EI.EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EI.EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM elp_issue EI INNER JOIN elp_issue_type EIT ON EI.ISSUE_TYPE_ID = EIT.ISSUE_TYPE_ID --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY Code, Expiration
SQL.LOAD_ISSUES_BY_DEALER: SELECT ei.issue_id,ei.code,ei.description FROM ELP_ISSUE ei inner join ELP_RULE_ISSUE eri ON ei.issue_id = eri.issue_id inner join ELP_RULE er on er.rule_id = eri.rule_id inner join Elp_Rule_List_Detail erld on erld.rule_id = er.rule_id inner join elp_dealer_rule_list edrl on edrl.rule_list_id = erld.rule_list_id where :nowdate BETWEEN ei.effective AND ei.expiration and :nowdate BETWEEN eri.effective AND eri.expiration and :nowdate BETWEEN er.effective AND er.expiration and :nowdate BETWEEN erld.effective AND erld.expiration and :nowdate BETWEEN edrl.effective AND edrl.expiration and edrl.dealer_id = :dealer_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_issue SET code = :code, description = :description, issue_type_id = :issue_type_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by, pre_conditions = :pre_conditions, issue_processor_xcd = :issue_processor_xcd, sp_claim_type_xcd = :sp_claim_type_xcd, sp_claim_value =:sp_claim_value, denied_reason_xcd = :denied_reason_xcd WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_issue ( code, description, issue_type_id, effective, expiration, created_by, issue_id, pre_conditions, issue_processor_xcd, sp_claim_type_xcd, sp_claim_value, denied_reason_xcd ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :issue_type_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :issue_id, :pre_conditions, :issue_processor_xcd, :sp_claim_type_xcd, :sp_claim_value, :denied_reason_xcd )
SQL.CHECK_OVERLAP: SELECT * FROM ELP_ISSUE WHERE rownum < '101' AND ISSUE_ID <> :ISSUE_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.CHECK_OVERLAP_DURATION: SELECT * FROM ELP_ISSUE WHERE rownum < '101' AND ISSUE_ID <> :ISSUE_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.GetSelectedQuestionsList: SELECT EIQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID AS ID, ESQ.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_ISSUE EI ON EI.ISSUE_ID = EIQ.ISSUE_ID INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_TYPE EIT ON EIT.ISSUE_TYPE_ID = EI.ISSUE_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_SOFT_QUESTION ESQ ON EIQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID = ESQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID WHERE EIQ.ISSUE_ID=:ISSUE_ID AND EIQ.EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.GetSelectedRulesList: SELECT RI.rule_id as ID, ER.Description FROM elp_issue EI join elp_rule_issue RI ON EI.issue_id = RI.issue_id join elp_rule ER on RI.rule_id = ER.rule_ID WHERE EI.ISSUE_ID=:ISSUE_ID AND RI.EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.GetAvailableRulesList: SELECT rule_id as ID, Description FROM ELP_RULE WHERE EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.SOFT_QUESTION_EXPIRATION: SELECT ESQ.EXPIRATION FROM ELITA.ELP_SOFT_QUESTION ESQ INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ ON ESQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID = EIQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID WHERE EIQ.SOFT_QUESTION_ID=:SOFT_QUESTION_ID AND EIQ.ISSUE_ID=:ISSUE_ID
SQL.SOFT_QUESTION_ID: SELECT SOFT_QUESTION_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION WHERE ISSUE_QUESTION_ID=:ISSUE_QUESTION_ID
SQL.RULE_ID: SELECT RULE_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_RULE_ISSUE WHERE RULE_ISSUE_ID=:RULE_ISSUE_ID
SQL.RULE_EXPIRATION: SELECT EXPIRATION FROM ELITA.ELP_RULE WHERE RULE_ID = :RULE_ID
SQL.IS_ISSUE_TO_NOTE_QUESTION_RULE: SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE EI INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_COMMENT EIC ON EIC.ISSUE_ID=EI.ISSUE_ID WHERE EI.ISSUE_ID = :ISSUE_ID UNION SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE EI INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_RULE_ISSUE ERI ON ERI.ISSUE_ID=EI.ISSUE_ID WHERE EI.ISSUE_ID = :ISSUE_ID OR ERI.EFFECTIVE > SYSDATE UNION SELECT EI.ISSUE_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE EI INNER JOIN ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ ON EIQ.ISSUE_ID=EI.ISSUE_ID WHERE EI.ISSUE_ID = :ISSUE_ID OR EIQ.EFFECTIVE > SYSDATE
SQL.EXPIRE_LIST: UPDATE ELP_ISSUE SET EXPIRATION = :EXPIRATION WHERE ISSUE_ID = :ISSUE_ID
SQL.CHECK_LIST_OVERLAP_TO_EXPIRE: SELECT * FROM ELP_ISSUE WHERE rownum < '101' AND ISSUE_ID <> :ISSUE_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.GetListItembyCode: select lst.list_id, lst.code List_code, lstitem.code List_Item_code , lstitem.list_item_id from elp_list lst inner join elp_list_item lstitem on lst.list_id = lstitem.list_id and lstitem.code = :item_code and lst.list_id = :list_id
